BibleTime Compound List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
BibleTimeThe main class of BibleTime
BT_BASICFILTERThis is the base class for all filters in BT
BT_GBFHTMLThis filter converts GBF Text into HTML
BT_ThMLHTMLThis filter converts ThML text to HTML text
CBibleKeyChooserThis class implements the KeyChooser for bibles and commentaries
CBiblePresenterThe presenter used for Sword Bibles
CBookKeyChooserThe keychooser implementation for books
CBookPresenterCreates a presenter object for generic book support
CBookTreeChooserThe keychooser implementation for books
CBTConfigThis class is the interface to the config object of BibleTime
CCommentaryPresenterThe presenter used for Sword commentaries
cfx_btnThis Class implements the direct chooser button used in the KeyChooser Widget
CGroupManagerThe groupmanager which handles all the modules and bookmarks
CGroupManager::ToolTipOur tooltip class
CGroupManagerItemAn item which implements functions to get the module of this item
CHTMLChapterDisplayThe display which renders a chapter
CHTMLDialogThis is a general dialog to show long error messages or report and solutions (Perhaps from an FAQ file)
CHTMLEntryDisplayThe display class for entry based modules
CHTMLWidgetThis widget enhances the KHTMLWidget to support BibleTime's colour management and to support verse references and the like
CInputDialogThis is a small input dialog with a multiline edit for the text input
CKeyChooserThe base class for the KeyChooser
CKeyChooserWidgetThis class implements the KeyCooser Widget, which consists of a QComboBox, two normal ref @QToolButton and a enhanced cfx_btn
CLexiconKeyChooserThis class implements the KeyChooser for lexicons
CLexiconPresenterPresenter used for lexicons
CLineEditActionThis class was created by Joachim Ansorg
CMDIAreaThe MDI widget we use in BibleTime
CModuleChooserBar
CModuleChooserButton
COptionsDialogThe optionsdialog of BibleTime
CPrinterDialogThis is the dialog where th eprinting specific settings are set
CPrintItemThe class which implements the printable items
CPrintItemListA KListView derived class which handles CPrintItem classes
CPrintItemListPage
CProfileManages one profile file
CProfileMgrThe manager for profiles
CProfileWindowContains the settings for one window saved in the profile
CReferenceManagerContains static functions to compute with referneces used for Drag&Drop and for hyperlinks used in HTML
CSearchDialogThe searchdialog of BibleTime
CSearchDialogAnalysisCSearchDialogAnaylsis shows the graphical analysis of the search result
CSearchDialogAnalysisItemPaints the bars for one book for one or more modules
CSearchDialogModuleChooserA widget to select the modules in which you want to search
CSearchDialogResultModuleViewHandles the search result
CSearchDialogScopeChooserThis class (CSearchDialogScope) provides the graphical user interface for the scope part of the searchdialog
CSearchDialogTextFirst tab page of the searchdialog
CStyleFormatA class which contains methods to support a format for the CStyle class
CStyleFormatFrameA class which represents the frame around different CStyleFormats
CStyleListPage
CSwordBackendThis is the implementation of CBackend for Sword. The backend implementation of Sword
CSwordBibleModuleInfoThis is the CModuleInfo imlementation for Bible modules managed by Sword. Implementation for Sword Bibles
CSwordBookModuleInfoClass for generic book support
CSwordCommentaryModuleInfo
CSwordKeyThe base class for all Sword based keys
CSwordLDKeyThis class is the implementation of CKey used for dictionaries and lexicons
CSwordLexiconModuleInfoThe implementation of CModuleInfo for the Sword lexiccons and citionaries
CSwordModuleInfoBase class for Sword modules
CSwordModuleSearchCSwordModuleSearch manages the search on Sword modules
CSwordPresenterBase class for all Sword based presneters The base class for all Sword based presenters
CSwordTreeKeyBibleTime's implementation of Sword's TreeKeyIdx class
CSwordVerseKeyThe CKey implementation for verse based modules (Bibles and Commentaries)
CToolClassProvides some useful functions which would be normally global. A class which contains static members to do small things
